dcterms:description: ScanNet consists of 1,603 indoor scans, collected by RGB-D camera, with 20 classes, where 1,201 scans are allocated for training, 312 scans for validation, and 100 scans for testing. Additionally, it utilizes 25,000 key frame images to train the 2D network.
dcterms:title: ScanNet

dcterms:description: nuScenes is a multimodal dataset for autonomous driving, comprising 700 scenes for training, 150 for validation, and 150 for testing, focusing on LiDAR semantic segmentation with 16 classes. It includes 24,109 sweeps of LiDAR scans for training and 4,021 sweeps for validation, each accompanied by six camera images.
dcterms:title: nuScenes

dcterms:creator: Holger Caesar

dcterms:description: nuImages provides 93,000 2D annotated images sourced from a significantly larger dataset, including 67,279 images for training, 16,445 for validation, and 9,752 for testing, consisting of 11 shared classes with nuScenes.
dcterms:title: nuImages
